DOC.brief_title: The Effect Five-Toed Socks Postural Control Among Active Individuals Who Have Chronic Ankle Instabilities
DOC.detailed_description: Lateral ankle sprain ( LAS ) one common injury sport . Ankle brace orthotic insole also show influence neuromuscular control system enhance proprioceptive cutaneous afferent input central nerve system ; thereby improve postural control . There unique style sock become popular Japan among athlete could also improve postural control enhance cutaneous afferent input plantar surface foot toe . The purpose study determine effectiveness five-toed sock dynamic postural control individual without chronic ankle instability .
DOC.criteria: member university community All subject physically active ( least 30 minute sustain exercise 3 times/week history : knee hip musculoskeletal injury surgery history : fracture dislocation test ankle leg neurological problem vestibular disorder concussion within last 6 month
